name: planted.steak
description: A plant-based steak crafted through fermentation. Juicy, tender, and full of flavor.
longDescription: Our planted.steak is a game-changer. Created through our innovative fermentation process using natural ingredients like soy protein and rapeseed oil, it delivers the juicy, tender experience you expect from a premium steak. Rich in protein and fiber, low in saturated fats, and packed with iron and vitamin B12. Approved by meat lovers and top European chefs alike.
ingredients: Water, soy protein (33%), rapeseed oil, natural flavoring, salt, iron, vitamin B12
preparation: Sear in a hot pan with a little oil for 2-3 minutes on each side for medium-rare. Let rest for 2 minutes before serving. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

steps.title: Season
steps.description: Your blank canvas. Go wild or keep it simple with salt & pepper.

steps.title: Heat
steps.description: Oil in pan. Get it hot. Don't be shy — high heat is your friend.

steps.title: Sear
steps.description: Golden edges. Crispy outside. 2-3 minutes each side. Done.
